stickerexchange.what: You give stickers, you receive stickers. Ez pz :ok_hand:
stickerexchange.when: Sticker Exchange will be Sunday at 00.00h. Don't forget your stickers :hackupc:
stickerexchange.where:
Oh, my database is empty for answer this question.
 You can question this to some of my human collegues or look it for on hackupc.com/live :smile:

talk.what:
This edition we have a lot of talks for you. From tech topics to know more about hackathons. Here you have all talks we have:
 - Intro to Git
 - *InfoJobs Talk*: Kotlin, a modern language for modern times
 - *iThinkUPC Talk*: Challenge
 - *Itequia Talk:* Let's make some music with Javascript
 - *Everis Talk*: Intro to Virtual Assistants
 - *Opentrends Talk*: Chat bot with Google Assitant
 - *AWSEducate Talk*: ???
 - *Typeform Talk*: API 101
 - *Skyscanner Talk*: Intro to Skyscanner API
 - *Vueling Talk*: Digital transformation, more cooperation and less hierarchy
 - *ServiZurich Talk*: In memory processing pipelines running in the cloud
 - *Soprasteria Talk*: Getting started with Natural Language Processing (NLP)
 - Organize your hackathon
talk.when: Talks will be on Friday night and Saturday morning, you can check the schedule on our website hackupc.com/live :raised_hands:
talk.where: Talks will be placed in different rooms from floor zero, in A5 Building. To know exactly the room you can watch it on our website hackupc.com/live. Hope see you there :happy:

bsc tour.what:
Want to see Barcelona's supercomputer? We have a tour for you organized by BSC:tada:
 Stay tunned, there will be several Evenwrite badges for attending on this tour.
bsc tour.when: BSC Tour will be on Friday from 16:15h to 18:00h. Hope see you there :parrot:
bsc tour.where: If you were previous registered, organizers and volunteers will be waiting you in front of check-in door.

team building.what: Want a team? Let's build it in this team formation session! :muscle:
team building.when: Team building will be on *Friday at 23:30h* :watch:
team building.where:
Team building will be placed in *A400X*.
 For visual indications you can check it in our webpage hackupc.com/maps :world_map:

rubik tournament.what: Do you think you're fast solving a Rubik's cube? Let's check it in this tournament!
rubik tournament.when: Rubik tournament will be on *Saturday at 20:00h* :watch:
rubik tournament.where:
Rubik tournament will be placed in *A500X || A4102*.
 For visual indications you can check it in our webpage hackupc.com/maps :world_map:

the game.what:
The Game? What? :parrot:
 Oh, got it. You lost.
the game.when: The Game will start at :pi: hour, don't fall sleep. :sleeping:
the game.where:
Do you ask for that? game.hackupc.com:parrot:
 Good luck :crossed_fingers:

nerfgun.when: Nerf Guns Battle will be on *Sunday at 01:00h* :watch:
nerfgun.where:
Nerf Guns Battle be placed in *A4101 & A4102*.
 For visual indications you can check it in our webpage hackupc.com/maps :world_map:

slideshow.what: You *MUST* be there! From last edition, the best activity in the whole weekend. Laughter assured! :joy:
slideshow.when: Slide Show Karaoke will be on *Saturday at 22:00h* :watch: and don't forget your voice :microphone:
slideshow.where:
Nerf Guns Battle be placed in *A5001*.
 For visual indications you can check it in our webpage hackupc.com/maps :world_map:

close ceremony.what: On Close ceremony there will be the final judging phase and winners will be announces. :see_no_evil:
close ceremony.when: Close ceremony will be on *Sunday from 14:30h to 16:30h*. :watch:
close ceremony.where: Close ceremony will be at Vertex building.

open ceremony.what: Open ceremony will start the hackathon :star-stuck:. It is the ceremony where will be explained all you need to have a nice weekend.
open ceremony.when: Open ceremony will start on *Friday at 21.00h* :watch:
open ceremony.where: You can see the Open Ceremony at Vertex building or floor zero rooms by streaming.

default.what: Sorry, I don't know what activity do you mean. But you can check all the activities on hackupc.com/live.
default.when: Sorry, I don't know what activity do you mean. But you can check all the activities on hackupc.com/live.
default.where: Sorry, I don't know what activity do you mean.
default.more: For visual indications you can take a look this wonderful web :smile: maps.hackupc.com

help: I know about lot of activities :smirk: Ask me about what/when/where is Sticker Exchange, Talks, BSC Tour, Team Building, Rubik Tournament, The Game, Nerfgun Battle, SlideShare Karaoke and Open and Closing ceremony :blush:
which: HackUPC isn't just programming. There are the following activities :arrow_down:
